text: During the 1977–78 season Hibernian, a football club based in Edinburgh, came fourth out of 10 clubs in the Scottish Premier Division and reached the fourth round of the Scottish Cup. ==Scottish Premier Division== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !
